headline: Shoals Technologies Group and First Solar Continue Partnership
summary: Partnership Reinforces Commitment to U.S. Solar Manufacturing and American JobsPORTLAND, Tenn., March 26, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Shoals Technologies Group, Inc. (“Shoals”) (Nasdaq: SHLS), a global leader in electrical balance of systems (“EBOS”) solutions for the energy transition market, announced its continued commitment to investment in domestic manufacturing in Alabama with First Solar, Inc. (Nasdaq: FSLR). This partnership enables the two companies to support the continued reshoring of do

headline: Q3 Earnings Roundup: Plug Power (NASDAQ:PLUG) And The Rest Of The Renewable Energy Segment
summary: Wrapping up Q3 earnings, we look at the numbers and key takeaways for the renewable energy stocks, including Plug Power (NASDAQ:PLUG) and its peers.
